ability.name: Chef of the Battlefield
ability.description: You can make {{x}} rank B-chelin dishes.

costumes.name: White Reaper

skill.name: Quarter Moon Jab
skill.description: Deal <<atk*x>> Fixed Physical DMG based off of the {{x}}% of ATK.

profile.description: My mission is to destroy evil. That is the only reason why I have come here.
profile.cherish: A sword bestowed by the Duchess
rumors: Umm, it's like no one's allowed to approach her or something. Seeing her hood completely covering her head. It seems as if there's something she want to hide.
With her armor and sword, I thought of her as a formidable person, but the next moment, she was suddenly ordering a cookbook. Not only that, her voice sounded very young

lines: Do not get in my way.
It can't be helped
This is also a part of my duties
Evil must be cut down.
This was a waste of time.
We should go back.
Cold and sharp, just like the moon.
This is the end!
Yaaaap!
Smells nice.

costumes.name: Knight of Blood

skill.name: Lunar Halo Slit
skill.description: Attack 3 times, each attacks deals <<atk*x>> Fixed Physical DMG based off of the {{x}}% of ATK.

profile.description: Until the day that evil is purged from the world, let's castigate the warlock together.
profile.affiliation: The Senior Knight of Kalian Imperial Security Task Force
profile.dislike: Someone who stares at her horns
rumors: You want to know how she was able to be knighted at such a young age? Haha, people who have crossed with her at least once will know.
Those things on her head... Aren't those horns? Having horns means she is no ordinary person, But... Huh? What? An ornament? Haha, of course it is.

lines: I will cut you down if you get in my way.
Everyone, ready yourselves for a fight.
To vanquish evil, is my duty.
Injured? Time to cook something...
It's over.
This is the fate of the evil.
Fall asleep under the moonlight.
I will punish you all!
Death to all that is evil
This is a dish that warms the heart.

costumes.name: Blood Glutton

skill.name: The Fang of Gluttony
skill.description: Decrease incoming DMG by {{x}}% for {{y}} turn(s). Consumes based off of enemy's current HP by {{z}}%. Heal 100% of consumed HP.

profile.description: Blood... Fresh Blood... If it were you... Would you able to quench this thirst...?
profile.hobby: Mediation... In he hopes that the impulse will subside
profile.like: Breezes that cool down the heat
rumors: The moment our eye met, my entire body froze. The sight of that pretty face, flushed, gasping to breath... I don' think I'll ever forget it.
She always seems to be feeling hot, It's probably because the bloodlust takes over her body and constantly releases heat...

lines: I wonder what your blood tastes like...
Urgh... I need to satiate this thirst...
Blood... I want blood...!
Now, I can drink...
Hahhh... gulp, Hmmm...
Ugh... what... have I done...!
I cant't hold back anymore...
Umph... Haaaaa...!
Blood... give me yoiur blood!
Cooking is merely a way to help me regain my strength...

costumes.name: Kendo Club

skill.name: Sakura Halo's Stroke
skill.description: Attack 3 times, each attack deals <<atk*x>> Fixed Physical DMG based off of the the {{x}}% of ATK.

profile.description: Until I gather all of the recipes in this world, I can't go back... No, forget what I just said.
profile.age: 17 years old (according to her admissions application)
profile.affiliation: Member of the Brown Secondary High School Kendo Club
profile.hobby: Watching the Cooking Club's practice sessions
profile.like: The sound of a Bamboo Sword swinging
profile.cherish: Companions she left behind in another world
rumors: D-Did you just see that? That transfer student, she just pulled out a baguette from the ears of her rabbit hood! No wonder the ears looked suspiciously big and chubby!
When I first saw that transfer student, I thought she was a middle school or something...But then I found out that she had knocked out the kendo Club captain and the instructor in one blow.

lines: I'll get this done before lunch.
It's a shame that this sword is not a real sword.
Such evil... In this world as well!
We'll be late for the next class.
This wasn't even a warm up.
Shall we return to the classroom?
Yaaap... Moment of opportunity!
Though it's a bamboo sword, it'll hurt a bit.
Prepare yourself!
This is the recipe of this world...

costumes.name: Pool Party

skill.name: Food Fighter
skill.description: Creates an Energy Guard which is equal to {{x}}% of max HP that takes DMG for 4 turn(s). Increase ATK by {{y}}% for 4 turn(s).

profile.description: The best dishes for the best party. If I can taste dished like this everytime, then maybe parties are not that bad.
profile.affiliation: Contestant of the Miss Aniweiss Final
profile.dislike: Playing around at the dinner table
profile.cherish: A normal, daily life with nothing much to do
rumors: Do you see the mountain of skewers over there? That petite lady finished all of those by herself. She really was like a bottomless pit.
If I had to choose the one person hiding the most powerful weapon in this party venue...

lines: I'll get this done before lunch.
It's a shame that this sword is not a real sword.
Such evil... In this world as well!
We'll be late for the next class.
This wasn't even a warm up.
Shall we return to the classroom?
Yaaap... Moment of opportunity!
Though it's a bamboo sword, it'll hurt a bit.
Prepare yourself!
This is the recipe of this world...
